Text: Looking forward to getting all of these! I don't usually seed much, but with these, I'll seed all I can! Thank you SO much, I've wanted the Smurfs for years!

Bout Time I Gave Something back To The Pirate Bay, Please Bear In Mind That My Internet Is Not That Good So Downloads Will Take Awhile But Hey The More Who Share The Quicker Everyone Gets This Fantastic Classic Cartoon
When will the Johan & Peewit episodes be uploaded? I'm only asking because they're aren't many, so it shouldn't take long to upload/download.
Scans would have been nice, especially of the episode lists. Not complaining.
